title: HKRN Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 04 Quality Engineer Posts
description: The Haryana Kaushal Rojgar Nigam (HKRN) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 04 Quick Engineer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ Diploma, B.E./B. Tech in Electronics and Mechanical Engineering can apply for the HKRN Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, ag...
